summary: v8.9.4 FORTERESSE Protocol Testing - All non-regression tests PASSED, frontend features verified
critical_code_review_comments: v8.9.4 changes properly implemented - coach icon aligned with filters in NavigationBar (SearchBar.js lines 236-261)
'Devenir Coach Partenaire' button correctly placed in ChatWidget (lines 3732-3755)
CoachSearchModal integrated with App.js (lines 4109-4116) via showCoachSearch state
Edit button in SuperAdminPanel has correct data-testid (line 327)
context_for_next_testing_agent: v8.9.4 FORTERESSE fully tested. Non-regression: courses, offers, discount-codes, payment-links, concept, users, feature-flags all intact. Frontend: coach icon aligned with filters (data-testid='coach-search-nav-btn'), modal opens on click, 'Devenir Coach Partenaire' visible in chat (data-testid='become-coach-chat-btn'). PUT /api/admin/coach-packs/{id} correctly requires authentication (403).

verified_features_v894.FRONTEND_coach_icon_aligned: PASSED - Coach search icon (data-testid='coach-search-nav-btn') visible and aligned with filter buttons
verified_features_v894.FRONTEND_coach_modal_opens: PASSED - 'Trouver un Coach' modal opens on icon click
verified_features_v894.FRONTEND_devenir_coach_btn: PASSED - 'Devenir Coach Partenaire' button (data-testid='become-coach-chat-btn') visible in chat widget
verified_features_v894.FRONTEND_edit_pack_testid: VERIFIED in code - data-testid={`edit-pack-${pack.id}`} at SuperAdminPanel.js line 327
verified_features_v894.BACKEND_coach_packs_get: PASSED - GET /api/admin/coach-packs returns list of packs
